name: Gueolf
description:
A last-minute entry for the 2018 7DRL jam, put together in the last two days.

Arrow keys to move and attack enemies.

'(O)' button (mapped to X on keyboard) to take a shot.

'(X)' Button (mapped to Z on keyboard) to select a club or cancel a shot if you're being approached by mobs.

When you're taking a shot, use the up and down arrows to change shot power and left and right to change angle.

I didn't have time to implement most of the stuff I wanted but I got just enough done that it functions. There's not much in there besides the base mechanics though - consider it a proof-of-concept prototype rather than a proper thing.

It's not had proper balance testing so expect difficulty spikes! Also ignore the par ratings for each hole, they're placeholder nonsense.
